api_list.name: Get Stats
api_list.description: This end point will return stats of NBA Player
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-stats8.p.rapidapi.com/stats/james.lebron/2011"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-stats8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-stats8.p.rapidapi.com/stats/{playername}/{year}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-stats8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
